DOC.brief_summary: This is a Phase II trial to study the safety and tolerability of subcutaneous alemtuzumab administered without dose escalation to patients with advanced B-cell chronic lymphocytic leukemia (B-CLL).
DOC.brief_title: Study to Evaluate the Safety of Subcutaneous Alemtuzumab in Patients With B-Cell Chronic Lymphocytic Leukemia
DOC.criteria: BCLL that has failed fludarabine Performance status grade 3
